name: Coral 2019
description:
Try to save the last corals on earth, before is too late!

Emissions are destroying our coral reefs. CO2 emissions return to sea and become Carbon Acid, causing Coral Bleeching and the deaths of all corals.

Coral 2019 was made for the "Videogame Laboratory 2018/2019" PON course, for the higher educational institute Torriani (Cremona). UNESCO declared 2019 as "International Year of the Periodic Table of Chemical Elements". We join the "United Nations 2030 Agenda for Sustainable Development", sustaining goal 14: "Life below water", raising awareness about the need of reducing marine pollution, acidification and protecting and restoring ecosystems.

=======================================

Coral 2019 is a 1-2 players coop game. You need a gamepad to play in coop. It's also possible to play alone with only keyboard.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Player 1: Gamepad

Player 2: Keyboard (Movement: arrow keys, Z to fire, X to change weapon)
